description: Trey has just got into another argument with his boyfriend. His man thinks he is cheating on him rather than going to the gym. Trey has him on his back and his load erupts all over his chest which sends Fernando over the edge in a frantic explosive ending with cum shooting in all directions. Surprised how big of a load he just let loose Trey notices that Fernando is married. Enjoy!
